name: Auto Coupon Generate for Gravity Forms
author: krishnagajera

sections.description:
Auto Coupon Generate for Gravity Forms gives user the ability to dynamically create coupon codes which can be use on a subsequent form.

Check requirements
– Gravity Forms
– Gravity Forms Coupon Add-on

Configure the snippet
The basic configuration only requires that you specify the which form should be used to generate coupons (form_id), which field’s value should be used as the coupon code (source_field_id), The length of the coupon code, The maximum number of times the coupon can be used, The minimum price of the product to be eligible, and the type and amount of the coupon.

If you have any question or features request, please access the plugin’s official support forum.
sections.installation:
From within WordPress

  1. Visit ‘Plugins > Add New’
  2. Search for ‘Auto Coupon Generate for Gravity Forms’
  3. Activate ‘Auto Coupon Generate for Gravity Forms’ for WordPress from your ‘Plugins’ menu from WordPress.
  4. Visit the ‘Generate Coupon Setting’ menu and fill in all the required field.

Manually

  1. Upload the GF-Coupon-Generate/ folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Visit the ‘Generate Coupon Setting’ menu and fill in all the required field.
sections.faq:
1. Is shipping amount included in the discount?

No, discount will be directly applied to the order total.
